doc.summary: ResourceLocation of a texture with the size 512x512 that is purely white.
doc.text: ResourceLocation of a texture with the size 512x512 that is purely white. It can be colored with  <ref cls="com/mojang/blaze3d/systems/RenderSystem" method="setShaderColor" type="(float,float,float,float)void">RenderSystem#setShaderColor(float, float, float, float)</ref>.

doc.summary: Same as <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/render/RenderHelper" method="repeatBlit" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,int,int,int,int,int,int,net.minecraft.client.renderer.texture.TextureAtlasSprite)void">#repeatBlit(PoseStack, int, int, int, int, int, int, TextureAtlasSprite)</ref>.
doc.text: Same as <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/render/RenderHelper" method="repeatBlit" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,int,int,int,int,int,int,net.minecraft.client.renderer.texture.TextureAtlasSprite)void">#repeatBlit(PoseStack, int, int, int, int, int, int, TextureAtlasSprite)</ref>. texWidth and texHeight are set from the sprite.

parameters.name: texWidth
parameters.doc: width of one texture element. If this is lower than displayWidth the texture is looped.

parameters.name: texHeight
parameters.doc: height of one texture element. If this is lower than displayHeight the texture is looped.

doc.summary: Same as <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/render/RenderHelper" method="repeatBlit" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,int,int,int,int,int,int,net.minecraft.client.renderer.texture.TextureAtlasSprite)void">#repeatBlit(PoseStack, int, int, int, int, int, int, TextureAtlasSprite)</ref> but with the u and v values set directly and not with a TextureAtlasSprite.
doc.text: Same as <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/render/RenderHelper" method="repeatBlit" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,int,int,int,int,int,int,net.minecraft.client.renderer.texture.TextureAtlasSprite)void">#repeatBlit(PoseStack, int, int, int, int, int, int, TextureAtlasSprite)</ref> but with the u and v values set directly and not with a TextureAtlasSprite.

parameters.name: buffer
parameters.doc: A VertexBuilder used to render the sprite.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.doc: The alpha value that should be used.

doc.summary: Renders a texture colored with a given color.
doc.text: Renders a texture colored with a given color.

doc.summary: Sets the color to the given RGB color in format 0xRRGGBB
doc.text: Sets the color to the given RGB color in format 0xRRGGBB

doc.summary: Sets the color to the given ARGB color in format 0xAARRGGBB
doc.text: Sets the color to the given ARGB color in format 0xAARRGGBB

doc.summary: Renders a text with a gray semi-transparent background.
doc.text: Renders a text with a gray semi-transparent background.

doc.summary: Same as <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/render/RenderHelper" method="renderGuiBackground" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,int,int,int,int,net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation,int,int,int,int,int,int)void">renderGuiBackground</ref> but with pre-set texture.
doc.text: Same as <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/render/RenderHelper" method="renderGuiBackground" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,int,int,int,int,net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation,int,int,int,int,int,int)void">renderGuiBackground</ref> but with pre-set texture.

doc.summary: Same as <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/render/RenderHelper" method="renderGuiBackground" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,int,int,int,int,net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation,int,int,int,int,int,int)void">renderGuiBackground</ref>  with the default GUI texture.
doc.text: Same as <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/render/RenderHelper" method="renderGuiBackground" type="(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack,int,int,int,int,net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation,int,int,int,int,int,int)void">renderGuiBackground</ref>  with the default GUI texture.

parameters.name: x
parameters.doc: The x position for the top left corner.

parameters.name: y
parameters.doc: The y position for the top left corner.

parameters.name: width
parameters.doc: The width of the GUI background

parameters.name: height
parameters.doc: The height of the GUI background

parameters.name: texture
parameters.doc: The texture to use for the GUI background

parameters.name: minU
parameters.doc: The minimum u position for the filling part of the texture

parameters.name: maxU
parameters.doc: The maximum u position for the filling part of the texture

parameters.name: minV
parameters.doc: The minimum v position for the filling part of the texture

parameters.name: maxV
parameters.doc: The maximum v position for the filling part of the texture

doc.summary: Renders a gui background of any size.
doc.text: Renders a gui background of any size. This is created from the chest GUI texture and should  work with texture packs. The width and height must be at least 9.

doc.summary: Some utilities for rendering in general.
doc.text: Some utilities for rendering in general.
